item.title: Man hole cover is bouncing under traffic, 13th December
item.description:
The tarmac around the man hole cover has sunk. The metal cover is now bouncing each time it’s run over and dangerous to bikes especially. It is. Also banging on contact by a vehicle

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 99-101, High Street, Goddington, Orpington, Greater London

item.title: House Bins used to save parking space, 13th December
item.description:
Afternoon House 70 Faversham Avenue is using their house bins to save a parking space outside there house, this has now been going on for several months now and becoming an eye sore and inconsiderate to others residents. Please can this be investigated as I believe it’s in breach of highway laws. I wish for my identity to be hidden. Many thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54, Faversham Avenue, Southbury, Enfield, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rendlesham Road pavements and streets covered with litter, 13th December
item.description:
Rendlesham Road is covered with litter - not just from fly tipping (which is regular) but no one seems to clean everyday litter or clean pavement and gutters anymore. The same rubbish has been on the road for weeks. It has got worse and worse over
